website_summaries.verdict: Offers versatile styling and a sturdy design that can be worn for just about any occasion, and comes at a price point that is surprisingly affordable for such classy timepiece.
pros: With its silver and gold tone finish, mother-of-pearl face, and diamond number markers, this watch has beautiful looks that are suitable for casual or formal wear
Features curved mineral glass and three-hand analog movement
cons: A few reports of dead batteries upon arrival have been noted

customer_reviews.title: nice. We have been happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. It is really.nice. We have been happy with the purchase. The only negative is that it came with box, but without instructions or really any authentication information from Bulova. The box was embossed with Bulova logo and of course, Bulova is on the water face.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Much to glitsy for me
customer_reviews.text: The description does say "with 11 diamonds" but the picture on the item page made the watch look fairly plain. I wear plain. No bling for this woman at all! And this watch screamed BLING at me when I opened the box. So it was promptly returned. It is a very nice watch, except for the jewels. I think it would be a great watch for women who want and enjoy shiny/glitsy jewelry. I am not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: V. W.

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite watch, just the right sized face
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite watch, just the right sized face, & the tiny diamonds give off a fabulous sparkle. Very happy that I bought it, & Amazon had an excellent price. I looked & tried it on at Department stores, & they wanted $300.00 for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty watch, but not quite as pretty as my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty watch, but not quite as pretty as my other Bulova. Purchased at a great price during cyber week, so I will be keeping it as a back up casual watch.
customer_reviews.author: Usually Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: ... known and i wanted something my mother would be happy with. She loves it and fits her well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because the brand is well known and i wanted something my mother would be happy with. She loves it and fits her well . It looks elegant. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Had to repurchase ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought me one as a surprise but I misplaced and I had to repurchase it cause I loved it so much.. it light and simple enough. They say nothing is perfect but this is right about there. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Chin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and service
customer_reviews.text: This watch appears to be of excellent quality and the price offered on Amazon was hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Gary J Gabard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, every thing about it not too small and definitely not too big..
customer_reviews.author: Hancheir Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice looking watch, but mine don't work, i hope maybe is a battery problem, i going to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this watch. Unfortunately,it was too small for my husband’s wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch, not too small or too big
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch, not too small or too big. Did not work when it was delivered. Took it to the local jewelry store and needed a new battery. It’s working OK.
customer_reviews.author: Aidita

customer_reviews.title: Good The clock was sent with the damaged battery did ...
customer_reviews.text: Good The clock was sent with the damaged battery did not work on arrival
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA MERICCY TIBURCIO MENA

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: I just bought for my Mom,and she likes it. Shes satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpestsword

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch! I love it! Its stylish and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Albachten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Good for everyday as well as dress up. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice watch to bad I could not get it running ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice watch to bad I could not get it running guess the battery was dead? I wasn't going to try to take it apart to check
customer_reviews.author: Paul Forkus Sr

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooo pretty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I wanted!!!!! It is beautiful, not to big or small, it's perfect! You will not be disappointed!!! Great, I mean GREAT price too!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but arrived with a dead battery
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but it arrived and the battery didn’t work so I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Great size - large but not too large. Streamlined; not bulky. Great deal. This is my 2nd Bulova watch. I've been very happy with them. My dad has one he still wears that's over 50 years old. Great quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alliteration

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: For $75 is it an excellente value, however very difficult to shorten the bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dead battery
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch but it arrived with a dead battery. Every watch I have ever ordered on Amazon has arrived not working - such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the watch. It is nice enough but it was just not as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: sandy manley

product_meta.title: Bulova - 98P145 Two Tone Gold Slim Duet
product_meta.description:
From the Bulova Diamonds collection. With stainless steel with silver-tone and gold-tone case and 11 diamonds individually hand-set on white mother-of-pearl dial, curved mineral glass, three-hand analog movement, fold-over closure, and water resistance to 30 meters. Diameter: 32.5mm




PRODUCT DETAILS

 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 9.6 Ounces
 * Item model number :98P145
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :July 7, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Bulova
 * ASIN :B0114W1T70
